title: Untitled
credit_line: Gift of Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur
provenance_text:
Raoul Ubac [1910-1985]; purchased from the artist by G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA, until June 26, 1965; by inheritance to his wife Mrs. G. David Thompson (Helene S. Thompson) [?-1982], Pittsburgh, PA, 1965 until 1967 [1]; Harold Diamond, New York, NY [2]; Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur [1922-2009], Pittsburgh, PA, 1967 [3]; partial gifts to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1977 to 1979 [4].

Notes:
[1]. See copy of memorandum from Reed Smith Shaw & McClay, dated December 11, 1985, in curatorial file.
[2]. The dealer had the work on consignment from Mrs. Thompson (See note [1] above.)
[3]. Mr. Winokur purchased the work from the New York art dealer Harold Diamond for $1,250 in 1967.
[4]. The work was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. It was received at the museum on December 18, 1979. Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1979 year-end gift was taken on February 7, 1980.
